snippet: Ludovic Morlot is the latest in a line of prominent conductors who have left their posts this year.
abstract: Ludovic Morlot is the latest in a line of prominent conductors who have left their posts this year.
lead_paragraph: It looks as though 2014 really will be remembered as the Year of the Departing Maestro: Ludovic Morlot announced Thursday that he would step down by the end of the month as chief conductor of the Théâtre Royal de la Monnaie in Brussels, citing differences with the orchestra.

headline.main: Morlot to Step Down as Conductor of Théâtre Royal de la Monnaie

keywords.value: Theatre Royal de la Monnaie (Brussels, Belgium)
